title: Create account at pbe
body: Can I still create an account at pbe?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=KlasperGamer,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qGf1hOjF,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-19T11:14:17.872+0000)
>
> Can I still create an account at pbe?can you give me one ,riot please?
Hello riot I would like you to have one PBE account so that I can try some new things and choose new heroes so I would like to give you an acaunt.
Me don't have account to play in sever pbe u can give account for me one ?
Sorry, I confused the error, you're right, it's the 500 error that occurs when I enter the page to register!
Are you having issues creating a PBE account after being invited? o.O
I'm having the problem of entering the page to register at pbe, it's error!

If it's the 500 Error, it's something we're aware of and are looking into. Some players have managed to workaround this error by temporarily using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield.**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/)

If you have any questions, let me know.
He starts loading the page and then appears error 300!
I've never seen this error before. Can you [**take a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of the page you're seeing and include the URL for the page in the screenshot as well?

Idk why but I had to come onto my alt account in order to comment on this. But I'm sure that what 99% of the issues we're experiencing is the website just being down. I'm not sure if Riot HQ is aware but the account creation after being accepted has been down for around 2 weeks. Or maybe its just me. Because after I was accepted I haven't able to comment on posts it seems like. The account that this has happened to is TheWindWarden on NA. But I hope the website gets fixed soon cause I'm really looking forward to testing out the sandbox mode on PBE  {{item:3073}} https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup
